scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && firebase deploy --only functions,firestore
scripts.normalize:dry: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.scripts.json node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/normalizeProducts.ts chairscope true no-refetch
scripts.retag:dry: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.scripts.json node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/retagProducts.ts chairscope true
scripts.summary:dry: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.scripts.json node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/generateAiSummaries.ts chairscope true
scripts.stale:dry: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.scripts.json node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/enqueueStaleProducts.ts chairscope true 7 200
scripts.stale: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.scripts.json node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/enqueueStaleProducts.ts chairscope false 7 200
scripts.predeploy:functions: pnpm run clean && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build
scripts.logs:morning: gcloud logging read 'resource.type="cloud_function" AND resource.labels.function_name="scheduledBlogMorning" AND resource.labels.region="asia-northeast1"' --project=affiscope --limit=50 --format='value(textPayload)'
scripts.logs:noon: gcloud logging read 'resource.type="cloud_function" AND resource.labels.function_name="scheduledBlogNoon" AND resource.labels.region="asia-northeast1"' --project=affiscope --limit=50 --format='value(textPayload)'
scripts.logs:rewrite: gcloud logging read 'resource.type="cloud_function" AND resource.labels.function_name="scheduledRewriteLowScoreBlogs" AND resource.labels.region="asia-northeast1"' --project=affiscope --limit=50 --format='value(textPayload)'
